PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-02022018-03-06,  ,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
ActContraventions Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Contraventions Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CONTRAVENTIONS REGULATIONS in order to (1) provide enforcement authorities, responsible for enforcing the Port Authorities Operations Regulations, with an additional enforcement tool for carrying out their mandate more effectively; and (2) promote compliance with instructions on signs and devices on property managed by Port Authorities while at the same time addressing both safety and security concerns.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0040 Publication Date: 2018-03-21
AttachmentsAttachment
